listing.listing_description: This coastal villa offers both interior luxury and panoramic views of South Africa’s most famous natural feature. As Table Mountain soars up nearby, take in the breaking waves and vivid blue of the Atlantic from the shaded recliner deck. With 3 self-contained homes onsite, privacy and peace is assured. Hilltop viewpoints and beaches are a short drive away, with cosmopolitan Cape Town nearby.Set amongst shrubs and palm trees, the rugged backdrop of the Cape’s mountains frame the cream-colored balconies and broad veranda of the home. Slip into the blue depths of the plunge pool for early morning refreshment, before drying off in the warmth of the sunlit recliners. The rustic touches that define the welcoming kitchen is offset by the porcelain space and modernity of the gleaming bathrooms, while examples of indiginous art and hand-carved furniture deck the pleasant, cooled living spaces. Groups will love the accommodation options, with the preserved house, newly-built pavilion home, and separate apartment all on-site.Overlooking the dramatic Atlantic coast, guests are spoilt for outdoor options at Claybrook. An extremely short drive will take guests to the sandy expanse of Camps Bay Beach, while fantastic walking trails and hikes can be experienced at the nearby Lion’s Head. From exciting rugby and cricket matches, to world-class shopping and distinct South African restaurants, nearby Cape Town offers all the pleasures of a global city, with nearby wineries also calling out for a visit. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a stylish holiday to one of the most exclusive areas of the Costa del Sol at Villa Bara. This luxury property is tucked away amid lush gardens in the coveted Nueva Andalucia neighborhood just a 5-minute drive from Marbella. More than 10,000 square feet of space and seven bedrooms, including three in a guest house, make this an ideal retreat for up to fourteen friends or family members.From the fountain at its entrance to its tree-lined garden, this vacation rental creates a serene ambience from the start. Relax under the Mediterranean sun in outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, loungers and a barbecue, or savor the shade of the al-fresco dining area. Inside, the villa has high-tech features such as a television, Wi-Fi and an alarm system.The inviting yet elegant feel continues inside Villa Bara, where modern furnishings and artwork fill sunny, spacious rooms. Black and red seating around the fireplace gives a lounge-like vibe to the living room, and the formal dining room seats twelve. There is a fully equipped kitchen in the main house, as well as a second kitchen and living room in the guest house.There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house, all with private en-suite bathrooms, and three in the guest house. In the main house, you’ll find one master suite with a king bed and balcony, and three bedrooms with queen beds. The guest house has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom.Though it feels like your own quiet haven in the sun, Villa Bara is just a short drive from the best of the Costa del Sol. Make the 5-minute trip into Marbella for a stroll through the historic city center or an evening out in the clubs, or the short drive to Puerto Banus for an afternoon on the beach or a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a gourmet restaurant. Avid golfers will appreciate having two courses nearby, too.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Expansive city and mountain views are yours at Hildene Haven. Nestled in the shadow of Lion’s Head in the Tamboerskloof area, this beautifully designed vacation rental offers plenty of space to contemplate the vistas. If you’re keen to explore Cape Town, it’s just a short drive from the city center, popular beaches and the V&A Waterfront.Start the day with a practice in the yoga room or a cup from the espresso machine. Watch the sunlight or clouds move across the mountains from private outdoor living areas with a heated swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a charcoal barbecue. In the evenings, unwind by the TV and fireplace or catch up on emails via Wi-Fi.The views are just as exquisite inside as out thanks to floor-to-ceiling glass windows that wrap around the open-concept great room. Sleek modern furnishings in the sitting area keep the focus on the spectacular landscape, and the dining area shows mid-century-modern inspiration in its seating for eight. There’s also a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with a king and queen bed, respectively, that share a bathroom. The four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family members on holiday together—or could be reserved for a honeymoon spent exploring the city and sampling South African wines.Though it’s tucked away on a quiet residential street, Hildene Haven is within easy reach of central Cape Town and must-sees like Lion’s Head and the V&A Waterfront. Spend a day out with the locals at Camps Bay Beach or Clifton Beach and splash in the waves yourself or just watch the water-sports enthusiasts take on the surf from a spot on the sand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on the Southern most point of Kissamos Bay, Youphoria Beachfront Estate combines two private villas to bring total accommodations up to fourteen. Imagine hosting your family get-together, corporate retreat, or wedding ceremony just steps from the sandy beachfront of the Aegean Sea. And, with the combined amenities of two villas, the hosting job becomes even easier.Clean lines and a minimalistic ideology allow the focus of Youphoria to remain clear, it’s all about the bright natural sunlight and endless views of the turquoise ocean. With natural features in mind, Youphoria’s interior features gorgeous wood finishings and flooring, locally sourced limestone, and a colour scheme that promotes a relaxed beach lifestyle. The living rooms feature plush couches and armchairs, television, and wide openings to the terrace. Each kitchen comes equipped with high-end appliances, espresso machines, and there’s a barbecue on the terrace. And, both villas have Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and security systems.Whether your group is feeling like dining inside at one of the formal dining spaces, or, having dinner under the stars, Youphoria has great options for both moods. After dinner, turn up the sound system and jump into an infinity pool, you’ll have two to chose from. And, don’t worry about housekeeping, it’s taken care of six days a week.All seven of Youphoria’s bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms with stand-alone showers, and one bathroom with a seperate bathtub. There are three bedrooms on the west side of the villa, two on the east, and the two more on a lower level.Kissamos Bay is a small fishing village in the Chania region. Well known for several important archeological finds, the old Venetian Governor’s Palace now houses a town museum, great for an afternoon excursion. While you’re there, explore some of the local craft shops, heritage sites, and delicious local cuisine, restaurants are easy to find along the waterfront.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in Santorini’s famous volcanic splendor from the comfort of this beautifully outfitted hillside villa. Complete with a sea view, the villa is nestled amongst the rugged, dynamic terrain of this storied island. A peaceful infinity pool, hanging seats, ornate overhead shading and comfortable white-and-wooden interior promise a great stay, with Fira town and the caldera very close by.Awakening to the refreshing Cyclades breeze, take up the best seat in the house from the terrace as the soft light colors of the morning sky slow play over Santorini. Breakfast is always a pleasure from the uniquely crafted exterior dining table, where the scene is mottled by the unique pattern of the grand sun shade above. As the Greek day gets going, dive into the gently flowing infinity pool for total refreshment, or plan an outing in the pleasantly cool interior which includes the long, finely-furnished and spacious living room where guests will naturally hang out. Outfitted to a style that closely matches the natural environment of this most unique of islands, guests can relax amidst subtle decor and finely crafted interiors that make great use of interesting doorway designs, stone and bleached wood.Less than 2 kilometers away is Santorini’s capital, Fira, built in impressive fashion along the steep cliffs of the island’s central caldera. Here, you can find an abundance of restaurants, bars and tavernas, which offer both local, Greek and international dishes to satisfy every taste. Guests can also visit the island’s unique beaches, with the dark sands and impressive bluffs of Exo Yalos being just over 2 kilometers away. Typical small white churches and food markets are scattered everywhere around the island for guests to visit. After a day exploring local sights and delights, relax with a refreshing glass of Santorini’s local assyrtiko wine, grown in volcanic ash, or take to the floating love-seat that sits in the evening blue of the villa’s pool.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: Queen size bed, Ensuite bathroom with Rain shower/bathtub combo, Dual vanity, Television, Desk, Safe, Air conditioning, Direct access to terrace

listing.listing_description: A pool and pond reflect fan-like palm fronds and blush-warm walls in their stillness at this oasis-like estate in quiet La Palmeraie. The villa delivers on a grand scale, with more than 16,000 square feet of space, butler service, and daily housekeeping, but also in smaller touches, like heated floors. In 15 minutes you can be sampling dates and sipping mint tea at the souks in central Marrakech.Lush gardens surround this vacation rental for a secluded, private feel. Start a holiday morning off slowly over a coffee in the alfresco sitting area, then shift to a lounger in the sun or directly to the swimming pool. Serve lunch from the barbecue at the outdoor dining table, and in the evenings, serve drinks from the indoor wet bar or gather friends and family around the satellite TV and Sonos sound system in the entertainment room.The villa is named for the word for “welcome” in Morocco, and it delivers with touches of comfortable luxury: warm-hued walls, soft rugs covering polished marble floors, and knit poufs in the multiple sitting rooms. The dining area has space for 14, and there’s even more room at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.There are 5 bedrooms in the villa’s main house and 1 in a separate pool house; all 6 have king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and air conditioning. The main-house master suite is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with its own lounge area, fireplace, and balcony.A stay at this villa means you’re a 15-minute drive from central Marrakech—close enough to pop in for the day to explore the World Heritage–designated Djemaa el Fna, find a favorite stall in souks selling everything from dried fruit to leather purses, or take a contemplative stroll through the Menara and Majorelle gardens.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capture city views on every side of this open-concept penthouse in Cape Town, just 5 minutes from the V & A Waterfront. Gather friends at the bar after an incredible dinner and plan out your night over a few cocktails. Throw on the Smart TV and see if there’s a rugby match on. Then, head out to watch the second half at one of the beachfront bars in the Clifton neighbourhood. Eclipse’s chic black-and-white color scheme shows off the penthouse’s formal side, while light-toned wood flooring and the rustic dining table remind you of the beautiful environment outside. Exposed brick and steel give the space an industrial edge and accentuate the openness of the main living area. In the kitchen, your inner chef will love the restaurant caliber appliances. The kitchen’s breakfast bar is also a great spot to hang out, especially when dinner is being prepared. And, if you’re in need of some alone time, step out to the balcony at night to watch over the city lights and glowing stars. In the morning, start bright and early with a walk along the sands of Clifton’s 1st Beach. After, grab your hiking boots and walk the 90 minute trail to the top of Lion’s Head. At the summit, you’ll be rewarded with the city’s most photo-worthy views. Make your decent, then head to V & A waterfront front for lunch and a little shopping. You could also scout out some nightclub options for later while you’re there.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A brand-new luxury property nestled into the ages-old island landscape, Villa Searock truly represents the best of Crete. This secluded vacation rental on the western coast looks out over a stunning panorama of sea and sky, but is only 5 minutes away from the beaches, restaurants and activities in Almyrida. Bring up to ten friends and family members for a sunny getaway in this one-of-a-kind spot—or just your sweetheart for a seaside honeymoon.Take in the views from oceanfront terraces with sitting and dining areas, plenty of loungers around an infinity pool, and even a barbecue and al-fresco shower. In the evenings, set the mood with the sound system,, challenge other guests on the video game system or post photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi. For the younger set, a baby chair and cot are provided.The L-shaped great room at Villa Searock takes full advantage of its hillside location, so you can take in the views from the living and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen. The furnishings are sleek and minimalist, from armless sofas to the graceful wooden dining chairs. The kitchen is equally understated and opens to the outdoor dining area for your convenience.Each of the villa’s five bedrooms has a double bed, a private en-suite bathroom, and views of the sea and garden. Open the bedroom doors to the terrace to let the breeze in, or keep them shut to sleep in air-conditioned comfort.Spend your stay at Villa Searock relaxing by the pool, following the private path down to the quiet cove just below the house or exploring the area. There are several tavernas nearby where you can sample the local cuisine, enough scenery to fill your camera’s memory card and sandy beaches at Almyrida and Kalives perfect for swimming or water sports. Don’t miss the historic cities of Chania and Rethymno, where ancient architecture sits alongside lively modern shops and restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Olive, palm, and pine trees nestle close to this newly built villa on Crete, making it feel like a rocky outcropping in the landscape. It’s built into the hillside and spills over the slope, with the pool and alfresco living areas stretching down toward the sea. Make like a local and follow a path to a small rocky beach or walk to the restaurant in the village of Likotinara.Soak in the sunshine from a lounger by the heated infinity pool or savor the shade of a pergola-covered outdoor sitting area. Just down the hill, a stone barbecue makes quick work of dinner, and alfresco living and dining areas tucked into the scenery invite you to linger outside over a bottle of Greek wine or around a firepit.Glass walls on 3 sides make the living room feel like an extension of the terrace, and a pair of plush blue-green sofas is just as welcoming as the loungers outside. Follow a hallway bordered by floor-to-ceiling glass to the open-concept dining area and fully equipped kitchen, where azure cabinets evoke the color of the sea.The villa’s location in the hamlet of Likotinara means you’re close to a local-favourite rocky beach and just over 2 km from the nearest taverna. Drive to nearby villages for restaurants and markets, and make the 9-kilometer trip to the island’s longest sandy beach. In 20 minutes you can be on the national road headed for the city of Chania.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Playa del Alicate is a lovely sliver of sand with windswept dunes. An ultra-modern two-story home faces the Mediterranean with a pool and wood deck facing the beach. It calls out to relax in loungers with swimming and waterplay between freshwater and saltwater. Semi-urban, it’s near Marbella, which is still a working city where great restaurants and bars are a given.The combination of wood, cement, stark white walls, decks, and glass sliders make Frontline Beach Villa a house of equal parts form and function. Technology and efficiency reflect in both the amenities and décor. Solar floor heating, a choice of stairs or elevator are all part of a future that is here in this house. Entertaining is simple and well organized with an open galley kitchen/dining space where sliding doors bring in the Mediterranean sun and breezes.Bring sand pails to collect shells on leisurely walks along the beach. Discover a centerpiece of driftwood or gather a few kinds of grass to add with lanterns lit on the deck and couch lounging areas. It turns the rhythm of the sea and being together into something special. Food and wine taste just that much better. Conversations seem just that more interesting. And time seems to ebb and flow with the tide. Explore Marbella and all its interesting shops and boutiques. It’s the old narrow streets and historical character that make it so colorful.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning contemporary villa in the high-end enclave of Camps Bay features spectacular living areas (including two swimming pools) and breathtaking ocean and mountain views. With six gorgeous bedrooms accommodating twelve, 26 on First is an ideal vacation rental for family reunions and destination wedding guests seeking privacy and consummate style on the Cape Town coast.Nestled on a lush hillside with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean, the gated estate provides a dream setting for relaxation and entertainment. Savor long days on the main-floor terrace, bathing in the swimming pool and relaxing on sumptuous sunbeds. Cook a classic braai (barbeque) and enjoy an alfresco lunch before withdrawing into the sumptuous, covered lounge. On cooler evenings, throw some logs into the wood-burning fireplace while savoring a fine South African wine. Downstairs, a second terrace includes a smaller swimming pool beside a zen rock garden.From the main-floor terrace, expansive glass doors open to the villa's cool interior, inviting fresh ocean air and lovely views inside. Enjoy evenings in the cozy lounge by the fireplace and TV. Prepare delicious meals in the light-filled, fully equipped kitchen, and pair them with a bottle from the wine cellar. In the morning, refresh your body in the fitness room and sauna. With serenely luminous walls and exquisite contemporary furnishings and artwork, the villa's décor reflects the natural beauty and world-class style of Cape Town.The superb master bedroom suite features a king bed, fireplace, private balcony with outstanding ocean views, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The primary guest bedroom also has a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub, while the other four bedrooms have double beds, two with ensuite bathroom and two sharing a bathroom between them. All enjoy unique and beautiful décor.26 on First enjoys an outstanding location, combining the serenity of Camps Bay with proximity to Cape Town's cultural and natural riches. Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach are just a few minutes away by car, as is downtown Camps Bay and Koeël Bay Market. The iconic mountains of Lion's Head, Twelve Apostles, and Table Mountain are all a short drive away. Cape Town center can be reached in ten minutes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: See a different side of Marrakech only minutes from the medina at Dar Sayang. Set along the Route Amizmiz, this architectural gem is an oasis of contemporary design and luxury amenities in the countryside. Invite up to ten friends or family members for a relaxed holiday at this idyllic retreat.Your stay at Dar Sayang begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a cook, housekeeper and round-the-clock security. Spend your time lounging in the sun by the pool, catching up on reading, listening to a favorite album on the sound system or simply taking in the views of the snow-capped Atlas Mountains, or challenge the group to games on the lawn or a volley on the private tennis court. Inside, you'll find amenities from massage and exercise rooms to a sauna, ping-pong table, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.Designed by the acclaimed Algerian architect Imaad Rahmouni, this incredible residence is both supremely chic and wonderfully comfortable. Floor-to-ceiling windows flood the open-concept living spaces with light, and the easy flow from the sitting area to the dining area adds to the breezy feel. Though your stay does include the services of a cook, the villa has a fully equipped kitchen.Continue your honeymoon from the everyday in the villa's five bedrooms, all of which have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and open to a terrace or balcony. Linger outside into the evening around the communal outdoor fireplace, or retreat to the fireplaces in four of the five suites.With golf, horseback riding and the city just minutes away, Dar Sayang is the perfect vacation rental for the active and the adventurous. Book tee times at one-or all-of the four golf courses within a short walk or drive, or set off from the Royal Equestrian Club. It's well worth taking an afternoon to explore the museums, souks and architecture of Marrakech, but at the very least, sit down to dinner at one of its renowned restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The peaks of the Twelve Apostles are a beautifully rugged contrast to the clean lines of this contemporary villa overlooking Camps Bay. A Jacuzzi bubbles on the terrace, and oversized windows frame the Lion’s Head silhouette. Fresh grilled seafood and local wine pairings are a 2-minute drive away in downtown Camps Bay, or you can go right to the source: the Constantia wine farms, 20 minutes away. Your holiday at this luxury Cape Town property includes the services of a cook, housekeeper and manager who live on-site; it might also include some affection from the huskies who live at the villa. Listen to the waves from a heated pool, hot tub, al-fresco seating around the firepit, or over dinner from the barbecue, and when you’re not watching the light move across the mountains, look to the satellite TV for entertainment. Smooth marble and slide-away glass lend a sleek feel to the villa’s open-concept great room. A blue area rug echoes the color of the ocean outside in the sitting area, and the beanbag is a playful touch. There’s plenty of seating for friends and family at a dining table for 12 and along the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master bedroom with a king bed, and 2 bedrooms with queen beds. There are also 2 bedrooms that share access to a hall bathroom: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed. All 5 bedrooms have ocean views. Montana del Mar is a 3-minute drive from some of the must-sees of South Africa scenery: Lion’s Head, the Table Mountain cable car, and Signal Hill. For a day at the beach followed by a casual meal or honeymoon-worthy prix fixe, make the 2-minute trip to trendy Camps Bay. And don’t miss the popular V&A Waterfront, a 15-minute drive from the villa. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: Aquatic House can be booked alongside Aquatic Penthouse (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/south-africa/cape-town/camps-bay/aquatic-penthouse-120792) to make up Aquatic Villa (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/south-africa/cape-town/camps-bay/aquatic-villa-120606)! Please inquire with your Villa Specialist for more details!With magazine-worthy interiors and a spectacular natural setting, Aquatic House adds up to the ideal Cape Town retreat. This Camps Bay vacation rental is just a short walk from the beach, shopping, dining and more, and a short drive from the city center. The three-bedroom property can be reserved by itself, or with Aquatic Penthouse for a getaway with a larger group of friends or extended family.The house’s two levels open to expansive outdoor living areas with views all the way to the Atlantic. Swim in the pool, read on a lounger under the pergola or sip refreshments on the sofas on the rooftop terrace, then heat up the barbecue and serve dinner at one of the two 8-seater al-fresco tables. After a day of sightseeing, unwind indoors with the help of the sound system, TV and Wi-Fi, or stretch out in the exercise room.Bright, open and beautifully furnished, the interiors of Aquatic House have been featured in design magazines such as Australia’s Modern Home, Germany’s Casa Deco and South Africa’s Habitat. The living room can be almost completely opened to the terrace, and its layout flows into a dining room and fully equipped kitchen. Throughout the space, neutral tones and textures of stone and driftwood create a refined feel of modern luxury.Each of the three bedrooms at Aquatic House has a king bed, private en-suite bathroom and balcony or patio; the master suite also has its own dressing area and fireplace. Two of the bedrooms have ocean views and the third looks out over the garden and Lion's Head mountain.Make the 10-minute walk from the villa to join locals on surfboards, couples on honeymoon and jet-setters on holiday at Camps Bay Beach, where you’ll also find a range of one-of-a-kind shops and oceanfront restaurants. It’s also a short walk or drive to Clifton Beach, and a 10-minute drive to downtown Cape Town and attractions like the V&A Waterfront.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sun shines overhead, the sea glimmers in the distance and a relaxed holiday awaits at the island retreat of Aelia. This beautifully appointed Crete vacation rental is set in the quieter area of Rethymno, close to a town and several beaches. Its resort-worthy amenities and five bedrooms can welcome up to ten friends or family members in modern Greek style and luxury.Your stay begins with a welcome basket full of wine and local treats. It only gets sweeter from there, thanks to outdoor living areas with a pool, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue in an al-fresco kitchen, plus a hot tub, sauna and massage room for the grown-ups and a playground for the kids. Inside, the amenities range from an exercise room, pool table and playroom to a media room and Wi-Fi.Creamy stone floors and charming wrought-iron accents set a refined tone in the open-concept living and dining rooms inside Aelia. A generous sectional and sculptural dining chairs provide seating for eleven, and there’s another breakfast table in a nook adjacent to the fully equipped kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with double beds and private en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a double bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a hallway bathroom. If you’re traveling with very young children, a baby cot is available upon request. Details like tufted headboards and stone-tile-clad bathrooms lend the bedrooms a look of contemporary elegance.From Aelia, you can make the 10-minute walk or take the three provided bicycles to the town of Skaleta, where you’ll find a quiet, pebbled beach perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll, as well as a few hotels where you can stop for a drink. If you’ve rented a car, it’s a short drive to Spilies Beach, Aquila Rithymna Beach, and the restaurants and nightlife of the town of Rethymno.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note: Rates advertised are peak booking rates. Lower rates may be available for specific travel dates. Talk to you Villa Specialist today for more details. _This exquisite four-bedroom villa is located within Club Marbella, a world-class resort on Spain's Costa del Sol. Guests enjoy access to the resort's extraordinary amenities—including a spa, swimming pool, and sport facilities—while the private home offers a superb private retreat with a swimming pool, spacious interiors, and comfortable accommodations for eight guests.The villa's garden and terrace offer 270 square meters of living space, with a serene, cloistered ambiance set amid lush hedges and trees. Enjoy enchanting days and evenings by the pool, plunging into the refreshing water and sipping cool refreshments on stylish loungers. Withdraw into the shaded veranda in the afternoon, and relish an alfresco meal at the table for six.Multiple sets of French doors open from the terrace to the villa's interior, inhaling the garden-fresh air into the interior salon. A comfortable lounge faces the fireplace, while the dining table overlooks the pool. The luminous kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and enjoys ample natural light. The villa's design and décor exude the classic style of Andalusia, with fresh white finishes and rich wood accents that celebrate the lush beauty of southern Spain.The villa features two bedrooms on each floor. On the ground level, both bedrooms (one with a king bed, one with two twins) open to the terrace and feature ensuite bathrooms. The upper-floor bedrooms are ideal for couples, with king beds, dual vanities, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and tubs.The villa is just five minutes on foot from Playa de Nagueles and minutes from the amenities of Club Marbella. These include a high-end spa, a pro-level tennis facility, riding stables, a botanical garden, and an eighteen-hole golf course designed by Dave Thomas (located about twenty minutes from the Club). Marbella Club is also an ideal venue for weddings, corporate retreats, and other special events. Aloha Golf Club and Las Brisas are close by as well, and Playa Puerto Banus is less than four kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Inside the gated community of the Nueva Andalucia Valley, Casa Siena resides amongst tall palm trees and lush tropical greenery. The perfect luxury home for a large group of friends and family, this vacation rental is private and serene, whilst enjoying close proximity to all of Marbella’s world-class attractions. Recently renovated to the highest standard, Casa Siena is ready to host your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.Casa Siena makes use of Spanish colonial architecture for its exterior design. Changing the traditional color palette to monochromatic shade’s of white and black creates a modern-chic take on the well-known style. The elegant decor and art-covered walls give Siena’s interior an old Hollywood vibe, making it a great setting for a social affair. Vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams open the living spaces, while large doorways and windows to the terrace help to ensure the flow of fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight throughout the spacious interior. The kitchen has a gorgeous and bright atmosphere as well. State of the art stainless steel appliances and clean white cabinetry will inspire your inner chef.Whether it’s a quiet night in, or you’re hosting an elegant dinner soiree for the whole group, Casa Siena has everything you’ll need. Television, Apple TV, Wi-Fi, and DVD player are great for a relaxing movie night with the family. For a bit more excitement, there’s formal dining inside, alfresco dining on the terrace, a sound system, pool table, and an outdoor kitchen with a bar. After dinner, take a late night dip in the heated swimming pool, or a rejuvenating soak in the hot tub.Nearby in the small town of Puerto Banus, you’ll find organic food markets, fine dining, Noranjos Golf Club, and pristine beachfront at Playa Puerto Banus. Travel a little further and you’ll be in the heart of Marbella. A city well known for its luxury tourism, Marbella is home to many of the world’s most exclusive vacation villas, yacht clubs, private beaches, and vibrant nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Savor the luxurious setting of an estate home set in the leafy backyard of Table Mountain. A grand driveway, white pillars and welcome balcony reflects the home’s regal welcome, with fine upholstery, tasteful furniture, and crafted chandeliers lighting up the interior. A marble-lined pool and rambling grounds offer fine views of the mountain, with cafes, wineries, hiking and river gardens nearby.Exceptional style and taste defines a stay at Bishopsview. Passing through the grand entrance, guests will find only the very best has been selected. Tasteful art, mirrors and lush house plants adorn the rooms, with a delicious lunch at the spacious dining table lit up by gleaming homeware and excellent lighting. The terrace is a treasure, with shaded recliners, imperial alfresco dining, and the unique pleasure of an exterior fireplace. This outdoor feature allows guests to bask in the refreshing microclimate of the Cape Town area, with exceptional scenery and verdant lawns giving a sense of peace and untouched privacy. Bishopsview is a wind-free environment, where you will be escaping the prevalent summer South-Easter.A huge range of stimulating activities are local to Bishopsview for both friends and family groups. Touch the gentle beauty of the local environment with local river walks, meandering past gentle steams and quiet woodland. The national botanical gardens offer an explosion of flowers, sculptures and skyway walks, with some of the country’s most established vineyards close by. Dramatic beaches at Llandudno and Sandy Bay are also just a short drive, with the nearby Newlands district offering grill houses and fine dining, plus cricket and rugby matches. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning luxury home is situated on the north shore of Crete, in the coastal countryside near Rethymno. Set amid lush gardens and olive groves, the 6,000-square-meter estate enjoys breathtaking sea views from virtually every living area. Ample outdoor spaces include a 100-square-meter infinity swimming pool, lounges and play areas, and multiple alfresco dining tables. Eight deluxe bedroom suites offer exquisite privacy to sixteen travelers, ideal for families, destination wedding guests, and large groups of friends.The villa offers an expansive venue for festive gatherings and special occasions, along with private spaces for peaceful relaxation. Tiered terraces extend from the main house, featuring lounge areas, a lawn, and a sparkling swimming pool lined with sun chairs and a canopied bed. The primary alfresco table is perched in a pavilion above the pool, accompanied by a charcoal grill, with fabulous sea views and lovely hanging lanterns for nighttime meals. There are two other outdoor tables on the patios flanking the kitchen.The main interior living area opens to the terraces through floor-to-ceiling glass doors, infusing the home with dreamy breezes and views. Fresh white surfaces glow with sea-reflected light, accentuating the fine wood accents and touches of rich color. The open-concept space features an oval dining table and a comfortable lounge with TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and enjoys easy access to all of the dining areas.There are two bedrooms in the main house: a master suite on the upper level and a king guest suite on the lower level. The other six suites are nestled inside independent bungalows—five attached to the main house, and one in a separate guesthouse located below the pool terrace. All of the bedrooms have superb ensuite bathrooms and access to a balcony or terrace. The guesthouse opens to an expansive terrace with sublime views.The countryside around Rethymno features enchanting hiking trails, wineries, and beaches, while the medieval city itself is just a short drive away. The larger cities of Heraklion and Chania are also within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Offering a gorgeous view of the rugged Santorini coast, this hillside villa offers inventive design and interiors, plus abundant comfort. Embrace the shaded balcony love-seat and blue pool, which sharply contrast with the volcanic scene beyond. The sun-reflecting white exterior houses a dream sitting room and plush bedrooms, with Ancient Thera and black pebble beaches close by.Awaken at Eolia Senior Villa and throw open the rich wooden shutters to allow brilliant Cyclades sunshine to warm the comfortable white expanses of your bedroom. Passing downstairs, guests can plan an active day amongst the ruins and buzzing towns of Santorini from the comfortable couches of the living room, as cooling AC maintains the ideal temperature. Make a splash in the pool, before resting on the shadowed terrace and watching yachts and ships make their way along the brilliant coast beyond. The villa features an exterior barbecue and an external shower, both of which are excellent resources after a long day on the beaches. The roomy kitchen ensures that guests can cook, eat and relax in convenience and style, with a golden Greek beer or glass of ouzo helping to wind the day down perfectly.This villa is a fine launchpad for exploring one of the most heralded sites on all of Santorini, the ancient ruins of Thera. Ascend the hills to explore echoing courtyards and crumbling columns, that recall the ancient glory of this island before the volcanic eruptions of the island sealed the settlement’s fate. Stunning black pebble beaches are also within a short drive, while the convenient ferry port at Athinios is also very close by. A developed and long-established restaurant scene is present in the locality, ensuring guests can try and sample a new Mediterranean delicacy every night.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on a sleepy hillside overlooking the Aegean Sea and Dia Island is a rambling multi-terraced villa among the wild cretin terrain. Large patios suspend over the hill, one with an infinity pool, all dotted with comfortable loungers and hammocks. The air is filled with the pungent scent of fresh herbs. This is the isle of Crete, the crossroads of civilization. Explore the small villages, the ancient ruins, the beaches and foods to feel the magic of the Mediterranean.Inside Villa Omikron are formal sitting and dining rooms decorated in French provincial with large windows looking out at the Aegean. Most bedrooms have balconies that catch the play of early morning sun and the romance of the indescribable Mediterranean light at dusk. But really, it’s the lush outdoors that’s the allure. The warm sun, the stunning views from multi-level patios, the pool, and the sizeable covered barbecue with its eating area, that makes for privacy, lazy days, and sleepy relaxation. Lamb kebobs grill on the barbecue, local greens, and fresh herbs dress the salads. The wine is breathing. Families gather under the thatched roof of the alfresco eating area. A seagull flies overhead. The supper is ready. A toast is offered to good health, to a long life, and to being together.Visit the Monastery Savvahiana, explore the ancient village of Rodia and Venetian Villa. A boat trip to Dia Island or Agia Pelagia bays is perfect for their beaches.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a secret garden in Morocco at Villa Jardin Nomade. Designed to be a completely private retreat on the outskirts of Marrakech, this boutique-hotel-inspired vacation rental is set on nearby two and a half acres lush with palm, orange and olive trees. Invite up to seventeen friends or a group of extended family to get in on the secret with you.Your holiday at this luxury property begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a household staff of six. Start each day with the provided breakfast, then spend the day lounging by the pool or reading in the pool house, pausing for complimentary coffee, tea or mineral water along the way. Test your skills on the ping-pong table or in the fitness room, or relive your honeymoon with a couple’s massage in the spa room (at extra cost).Inside its open-concept rooms, Villa Jardin Nomade pairs traditional pieces—Beni Ouarain rugs, incredible artwork—with the modern—arc lamps, wall-to-wall windows—to stunning effect. Open the gracefully arched doors to the terrace to let warm breezes flow through the open living and dining areas or, on cooler evenings, cozy up to the fireplace. There’s also a convenient fully equipped kitchen.There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house, all with king beds, and two bedrooms in two separate pavilions: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and many have shared balconies or terraces and their own living areas.From the villa’s location on the Route Amizmiz, it’s a short drive to your choice of several golf courses and, for those traveling with kids, the Oasiria Water Park. Be sure to leave a day in your schedule to explore central Marrakech, from the ever-lively Jemaa el-Fna to the tranquil Jardin Majorelle.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Avi Beach House is a spectacular beachfront villa on the southern coast of Crete in the Heraklion region. Situated directly on the secluded Meakis Beach, just outside the village of Arvi, the villa is built gracefully into the seafront cliffs and enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of the Libyan Sea. Three buildings compose the home: a five-bedroom main house, a six-bedroom guesthouse, and a second guesthouse with a single bedroom—accommodating up to thirty guests in all. With high-end amenities for cooking and relaxation, the villa offers an ideal setting for family reunions and special occasions with friends.The house is nestled amid flower-clad dunes, pine and cedar forests, and soft white sands where sea turtles lay their eggs every June. Its position enjoys direct sunset views between October and March, while the lack of ambient light creates a stargazers' paradise every night of the year. In this exquisite haven, ample outdoor living areas and invite you to savor the timeless pleasures of the Greek Isles. Plunge into the swimming pool or crystalline waves. Revel in the sunlight on the beach or terrace, and withdraw beneath a rustic pergola for cool drinks in the breeze. Take advantage of the outdoor kitchen and two grills to cook seafood barbecues in the afternoon, and relish them alfresco in the beautiful veranda, accompanied by a bottle of local wine.The luminous interiors are furnished with an elegant minimalism, accentuating the natural splendor of your surroundings. The kitchen is superbly appointed for the contemporary chef, and easily serves both the outdoor dining area and the interior table. The spacious living room includes a fireplace and TV. Ample windows infuse the home with inspiring vistas.In the main house, each bedroom features an ensuite bathroom, safe, and TV. The top-level suite opens to a lofty terrace with privileged views. In the large guesthouse, two of the rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms while the others share bathrooms in pairs. The smaller, seaside guesthouse features a double bed and ensuite bathroom.Beyond the private world of Avi Beach House, explore the secluded beaches and ancient villages of Crete's serene southern coast—including Arvi and Keratocampos—or venture inland to experience the famed vineyards, wineries, and mountain towns of Heraklion.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Cape Town at the uber-cool North. Gorgeously furnished and conveniently located, this five-bedroom Green Point vacation rental is close to dining, shopping, the V&A Waterfront and the city center. Sleek interiors filled with art and outdoor living spaces overlooking Green Point Common and the ocean mean there’s plenty to admire inside and out.If the sea views don’t tempt you out onto the front terrace, perhaps the heated rim-flow pool, loungers in the sun and shaded sitting area will. Time your afternoon cocktails to the sunset to best appreciate the stunning vista, then sit down to dinner from the barbecue at the al-fresco table. If it gets chilly, light a fire in the outdoor fireplace or sneak out to the rear terrace, which has a private spa pool.Interiors by one of South Africa’s leading designers feel effortlessly chic, while wall-to-wall windows perfectly frame the ocean views. Relax on the living room’s paired cream-colored sofas or gather around a sleek dining table that seats ten, all beneath a collection of South African and European artwork. There’s even more seating at the bar in the fully equipped kitchen, as well as a sliding window that opens to create a service area for the rear terrace.The atmosphere of inviting luxury continues in the five bedrooms at North, all of which have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and access to a terrace or balcony. Look for details like upholstered or built-in headboards and floor-to-ceiling windows in the bedrooms and, in the bathrooms, on-trend subway tile and angular sconces.With easy access to the beaches, dining, shopping and attractions, North is ideal for a stylish getaway with friends, relaxed holiday with family or even an indulgent honeymoon. Watch both the jet set and the locals enjoying the sandy shores and azure waters of nearby Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, or take a hike—or cable car—up Lion’s Head or Table Mountain, all less than 15 minutes away. Find unique shopping and quaint architecture at the charming V&A Waterfront, plus oceanfront dining and scenic drives along the Atlantic Seaboard.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With golf, horseback riding and the city just minutes away, Villa Boudha is the perfect vacation rental for the active and the adventurous. Book tee times at one-or all-of the four golf courses within a short walk or drive, or set off from the Royal Equestrian Club. It's well worth taking an afternoon to explore the museums, souks and architecture of Marrakech, but at the very least, sit down to dinner at one of its renowned restaurants.
